interactivity.to_get_this_event: Have 20+ Makoto Lust before chain starts. Autoplays after " We Were Angels " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Good Morning " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Have less than 20 Makoto Lust before Good Morning . Replaced by Cold Water .

progression.synopsis: Makoto leads Sensei to a small hot-spring near the inn. They talk about their relationship and Makoto's rule-abiding nature. As the two hang out, Miku arrives, leaving the two feeling awkward until she eventually leaves.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .19p2.
